headline.main: Maine's Largest City Considers Giving Jobs to Panhandlers
headline.print_headline: Maine's Largest City Considers Giving Jobs to Panhandlers

lead_paragraph: Germany opposes a proposal by France and Italy to use bonds to finance a new 5 billion euro (4.32 billion pounds) European Union defence research fund, saying it would not be a viable way to finance European military projects, according to the Handelsblatt newspaper.
